entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 20.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Showers at times heavy beginning this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 20. UV index 9 or very high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers at times heavy. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending this evening then cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Local amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 11. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
